greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sigma(n'), the sum of divisors of the arithmetic derivative of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..20000
program: (PARI) rd(n) = {local(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1];));} \\ from A003415
results.author: _Luca Brigada Villa_, Sep 24 2013
